title: Is history useful for students in future? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess this is one of the few questions that haunts most of the students while studying this “so called boring n dubious “ subject but now I wish that u see the seldom benefits of reading this subject. future is a predicament of the past which reflects on every flaw occurred in the past . that is to say at least about this subject. I myself was not key admirer of this subject until I discovered the treasures it kept safe underneath it. history , being prejudiced to only dates make me feel so anxious n yet so astonished that people so easily take this subject for granted. so did u ever think why another cold war never happened or why for that matter u still enjoy all the liberties n some people out there like Myanmar’s people are still fighting to enjoy the democracy we are so lucky to have.simply look at the fund. rights u have which u have inherited from ur forefathers. that all accounts history, but, as I may say in the accustomed way. so just delve ur mind further and deep down you will see that this subject teaches morality,friendship,treachery,espionage n we all try to learn something n adopt others like the ravishing arch. marvels of our ancestors. so keep loving n liking it.that’s it!!!!!!

History is a very important thing.It has many benefits on students .Generally it is presented before students as a boring subject where students have to learn a lot to score well in exams. History depicts everything of the past which if narrated well by the teachers will leave great impact on students and they will find it very interesting. It is said that history repeats itself.All that happened in the past will definitely happen in the future.Hence History can give us proper solution in similar arising situations. History can sharpen the memories of students. It can tell the real nature of our ancestors. History can teach us and inspire us to meet the challenges of the life successfully. The mistakes done in the past can be corrected now.
